section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using the GetRaze platform ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, do not use the Service. Continued use of the platform after changes to the terms constitutes your acceptance of the modifications.

section2.title: 2. Description of Service
section2.content: GetRaze is an artificial intelligence platform for multichannel prospecting and engagement. The Service provides tools for lead search, outreach automation across multiple channels (LinkedIn, email, among others), and prospect relationship management, using AI agents to optimize the sales process.

section3.title: 3. Intermediary Nature
section3.content: GetRaze acts exclusively as an intermediary between you and the official services of integrated platforms (such as LinkedIn, Meta, among others). We DO NOT store data from these social networks on our servers. All actions performed through GetRaze are executed through the official APIs and interfaces of these services, respecting their terms of use and policies.

section4.title: 4. User Accounts
section4.content: To use the Service, you must create an account providing accurate and up-to-date information. You are responsible for:
items: Maintaining the security of your password and access credentials
All activities carried out under your account
Immediately notifying GetRaze of any unauthorized use
Keeping your account information up to date

section5.title: 5. Acceptable Use
section5.content: You agree NOT to use the Service to:
items: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Send spam or unsolicited mass communications
Collect personal information without proper legal basis
Interfere with or disrupt the operation of the Service
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Service
Use the Service for illegal or unauthorized purposes
Violate the terms of use of integrated platforms (LinkedIn, Meta, etc.)

section6.title: 6. Credits and Subscription
section6.content: The Service operates on a credit and subscription plan system. Credit limits and features included in each plan may change periodically. We will notify you of significant changes with reasonable advance notice. All payments are processed securely by our payment providers.

section7.title: 7. No Lock-in
section7.content: GetRaze does NOT require loyalty or minimum commitment. You may cancel your subscription at any time, without fines or penalties. After cancellation, your access to the Service will remain active until the end of the already paid period.

section8.title: 8. Intellectual Property
section8.content: The Service, including its original content, features, technology, and design, is the exclusive property of GetRaze and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

section9.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
section9.content: GetRaze shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses resulting from the use or inability to use the Service. GetRaze is not responsible for actions taken by integrated platforms (such as LinkedIn account restrictions) as a result of using the Service.

section10.title: 10. Termination
section10.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the Service immediately, without prior notice, in case of violation of these Terms. You may also close your account at any time. After termination, your data will be retained for 30 days and then permanently deleted.

section11.title: 11. Changes to Terms
section11.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Significant changes will be communicated through the platform. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

section12.title: 12. Governing Law
section12.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil, including the General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law No. 13,709/2018). Any disputes shall be submitted to the jurisdiction of the courts at GetRaze's headquarters.

section13.title: 13. Contact
section13.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@getraze.co.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: GetRaze ("we") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our platform, in compliance with the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD).

section2.title: 2. Data We Collect
section2.content: We collect the following types of data:

section3.title: 3. What We Do NOT Collect
section3.content: GetRaze acts as an intermediary for the official services of integrated platforms. We DO NOT store on our servers:
items: Third-party social media profile data
Messages or conversations from external platforms
Third-party social media access credentials
Personal data of leads or prospects outside the platform context
section3.note: All interactions with external platforms are carried out in real time through secure and authorized connections, without permanent retention of this data.

section4.title: 4. How We Use Your Data
items: Provide and maintain the Service
Process transactions and send related information
Send administrative communications and Service updates
Respond to support requests
Improve and personalize the user experience
Analyze usage to enhance the Service
Protect against fraudulent or illegal activities

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.content: We implement robust technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. Our infrastructure holds SOC 2 Type II certification and complies with GDPR (European General Data Protection Regulation), ensuring the highest standards of security and data protection.

section6.title: 6. Data Sharing
section6.content: We may share your information only with:
items: Essential service providers for platform operations (payment processing, hosting)
Legal authorities when required by law
Business partners, only with your explicit consent
section6.note: We never sell your personal data to third parties.

section7.title: 7. Data Retention
section7.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Policy. After account cancellation, your data will be kept for 30 days for possible reactivation and then permanently deleted.

section8.title: 8. Your Rights (LGPD)
section8.content: Under the General Data Protection Law, you have the right to:
items: Confirmation of the existence of data processing
Access to your personal data
Correction of incomplete, inaccurate, or outdated data
Anonymization, blocking, or deletion of unnecessary data
Data portability to another provider
Deletion of data processed with your consent
Information about data sharing
Withdrawal of consent at any time
section8.note: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@getraze.co.

section9.title: 9. International Transfers
section9.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers, in compliance with LGPD and applicable international regulations.

section10.title: 10. Cookies
section10.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to keep your session active, remember your preferences, and improve the platform experience. You can manage cookie settings in your browser.

section11.title: 11. Children's Privacy
section11.content: The Service is not intended for individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors.

section12.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
section12.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated through the platform and you will be asked to accept the updated version.

section13.title: 13. Contact
section13.content: For questions about this Privacy Policy or to exercise your rights, please contact us:
items: General email: legal@getraze.co
Privacy and data: privacy@getraze.co
